timeline.message: add "isCd" to user api output - fix test
add feature flag to user api for use in console

timeline.bodyText: put it above ZONE_ID, which is a bit special.
timeline.author: hakonhall
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -57,7 +57,10 @@ *

NOTE: There is seldom any need to set ZONE_ID, as all flags are set per zone anyways. The controller * could PERHAPS use this where it handles multiple zones. */ - ZONE_ID + ZONE_ID, + + /** Email address of user - provided by auth0 in console. */ + CONSOLE_USER_EMAIL

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/flags/src/main/java/com/yahoo/vespa/flags/FetchVector.java b/flags/src/main/java/com/yahoo/vespa/flags/FetchVector.java index 02adfd1a14..89c4f16e27 100644 --- a/flags/src/main/java/com/yahoo/vespa/flags/FetchVector.java +++ b/flags/src/main/java/com/yahoo/vespa/flags/FetchVector.java @@ -51,16 +51,16 @@ public class FetchVector { */ VESPA_VERSION, + /** Email address of user - provided by auth0 in console. */ + CONSOLE_USER_EMAIL, + /** * Zone from ZoneId::value of the form environment.region. * *

NOTE: There is seldom any need to set ZONE_ID, as all flags are set per zone anyways. The controller * could PERHAPS use this where it handles multiple zones. */ - ZONE_ID, - - /** Email address of user - provided by auth0 in console. */ - CONSOLE_USER_EMAIL + ZONE_ID } private final Map map;
